legendaryItems.description: Pet is immune to Fire damage
Pet is immune to Poison damage
Pet is immune to Electric damage
On Pet Hits: Recover 3% Health for both you and pet
<span color="#FFD700">Explosive Arrow</> causes three smaller explosions randomly in an area dealing 30% Weapon Damage each
Hit with <span color="#FFD700">Onslaught</>: call down a lightning strike, dealing 100% Weapon Damage (max once per sec.)
Cast any <span color="#FFD700">Precision</> skill: 10% chance to fire <span color="#FFD700">Heart Seeker</> for free
<span color="#FFD700">Rapid Fire</>'s Weapon Damage bonus increased by 10 stacks
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Poison Dart</>: fire 2 additional darts in a spread

Hit with <span color="#FFD700">Rapid Fire</>: gain a <span color="#FFD700">Shock Charge</>, once per 3 sec. (stacks up to 3 times)
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Shotgonne Blast</>: spend all <span color="#FFD700">Shock Charges</> to fire an energy blast dealing 300% Weapon Damage per Charge
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Coal Launch</>: if above 75 Heat, more coal fragments rain down on enemies for 120% Weapon Damage each
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Vortex Bomb</>: if above 75 Heat, trigger a secondary heat wave, dealing 400% Weapon Damage
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Holy Bolt</>: 50% chance to cast <span color="#FFD700">Absolver</>
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Energy Spike</>: while <span color="#FFD700">Harmonic Form</> is active, fire a barrage of <span color="#FFD700">Unholy Bolts</>
<span color="#FFD700">Entropy</> gains twice as many projectiles and an 8 sec. cooldown
For each type of minion <span color="#FFD700">Spirit Well</> spawns, it spawns another.
While channeling <span color="#FFD700">Holy Fury</>: regenerate 5% Max Health per sec. and increase your Poison Defense by 100%
<span color="#FFD700">Radiant Blast</> deals 400% more damage and has a 6 sec. cooldown
Cast any <span color="#FFD700">Adventurer</> Skill: reduce <span color="#FFD700">Reload</>'s cooldown by 1 sec.
<span color="#FFD700">Mortar Car</> and <span color="#FFD700">Flamethrower Car</> always gains their Endurance Bonus when activated, and do not spend Endurance.
Cast <span color="#FFD700">{SkillName}</>: also cast a skill from another random Relic
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Luminous Run</>: create an explosion, dealing 600% Weapon Damage
<span color="#FFD700">Consecration</> also poisons nearby enemies, dealing 125% Weapon Damage per sec.
Increase the number of <span color="#FFD700">Unholy Bolt</> projectiles to 5
Hit with <span color="#FFD700"> Basic Attack</>: call down a <span color="#FFD700">Lightning Strike</>, dealing an additional 200% Weapon Damage (max once per sec.).
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Ramming Robot</>: if above 75 Heat, vent all heat to deal 200% Weapon Damage when you start and stop moving
Gain <span color="#FFD700">Active Skill - Call the Legion</>: Summon a battalion of ghostly skeleton fighters for 20 seconds.
<span color="#FFD700">Blasting Charge</> always gains its Endurance Bonus when activated, and does not spend Endurance.
On Hit: 10% chance to drop Stalactites, dealing 30% Weapon Damage in an area
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Rapid Strike</>: fire a piercing projectile that deals <span color="#FFD700">Rapid Strike</>'s Weapon Damage
Activate a Train Car:  your lead car fires 2 additional bullets in a spread for 6 sec.
Pet returns from town 90% faster
Pet returns from fleeing 90% faster
Every 8 sec.: pet triggers a <span color="#FFD700">Fire Nova</>, dealing 300% Weapon Damage
Pet poisons nearby enemies, dealing 40% Weapon Damage per sec.
Pet occasionally summons the spirits of <span color="#FFD700">Bijou</> and <span color="#FFD700">Simon</> to fight in combat for 30 sec.
Pet uses Active Skill: emites a <span color="#FFD700">Shock Nova</>, dealing 300% Weapon Damage
On Pet Hits: 10% chance to refresh cooldowns of pet's Active Skills
<span color="#FFD700">Sacrifice to Goose</> now leaves a burning area after impact, doing 50% Weapon Damage that lasts 6 sec.
<span color="#FFD700">Scout's Bones</> fires off poison missiles around it that do 50% Weapon Damage each.

Cast any <span color="#FFD700">Cooldown</> skill: gain a <span color="#FFD700">Shock Charge</> (stacks up to 3 times)
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Pound</>: spend a <span color="#FFD700">Shock Charge</> to create an electrical shockwave, dealing <span color="#FFD700">Pound</>'s Weapon Damage
<span color="#FFD700">Spike Drive</> and <span color="#FFD700">Pound</> gain an additional Charge
<span color="#FFD700">Hammer Spin</> deals 25% more damage, gains 1 additional charge, and has a 25% lower cooldown
<span color="#FFD700">Heart Seeker</> now does <span color="#FFD700">Chain Lightning</> on hit, striking up to three enemies for 50% of Heart Seeker's current damage
<span color="#FFD700">Goblin Legion</> now also summons three <span color="#FFD700">Ghostly Gunners</>
<span color="#FFD700">Scatter Shot</>'s damage and cooldown are doubled

Cast <span color="#FFD700">{SkillName}</>: summon 3 Skeleton Knights for 20 sec.
With <span color="#FFD700">Bonerazor</> equipped:
Cast <span color="#FFD700">{SkillName}</>: summon 4 Skeleton Archers for 20 sec.

On Block: counterattack with a fireball that deals 75% Weapon Damage
Empowers <span color="#FFD700">Firestarter</>

On Block: 20% chance to summon a <span color="#FFD700">Divine Alpaca Messenger</> who fires bolts of energy at your enemies for 12 sec.
Up to 3 <span color="#FFD700">Divine Alpaca Messengers</> can be summoned at a time
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Ghost Train</>: summon an Ancestral Spirit
Cast <span color="#FFD700">Dark Spears</>: call down a lightning bolt, stunning enemies inside for 1 sec. and dealing 80% Weapon Damage
<span color="#FFD700">Loyal Shasta</> deals 100% more damage, and heals you for 10% of your health when she Taunts
<span color="#FFD700">Shotgonne Car</> and <span color="#FFD700">Shield Car</> always gains their Endurance Bonus when activated, and do not spend Endurance.
Use <span color="#FFD700">Basic Attack</>: Launch up to 3 snaking poison bolts, each dealing 40% Weapon Damage

+10% Movement Speed
When you use a Potion: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 sec.
Hit with <span color="#FFD700"> Basic Attack</>: gain <span color="#FFD700">Frenzy</>, increasing Attack Speed with Basic Attacks by 5% for 5 sec. Stacks up to 10 times.
Movement Skills have +1 Charge, and gain charges 20% faster
On Kill of Unique or Legendary monster: Gain a random Shrine effect

Potions heal for 50% more Health
+50% Potion Luck

Cast your <span color="#FFD700">{SkillName}</>: summon 3 Skeleton Warriors for 20 sec.
Empowers <span color="#FFD700">Boneblocker</>

Cast <span color="#FFD700">{SkillName}</>: gain a <span color="#FFD700">Fire Charge</>
Use <span color="#FFD700">Basic Attack</>: spend a <span color="#FFD700">Fire Charge</> to hurl fireballs, each dealing 80% Weapon Damage
With <span color="#FFD700">Firewall</> equipped:
Cast <span color="#FFD700">{SkillName}</>: gain 2 more <span color="#FFD700">Fire Charges</>
<span color="#FFD700">Servo-Driven Uppercut</> gains 200% increased Weapon Damage, 200% increased Heat cost, a 4 sec. cooldown, and fires a wave of energy that travels through enemies
<span color="#FFD700">Flying Picks</> gain 50% Increased initial Weapon Damage, recharges twice as fast, and applies Poisoned instead of Bleeding
Use <span color="#FFD700">Basic Attack</>: if at full health, also fire a blade of force, dealing 70% Weapon Damage to enemies
Gain <span color="#FFD700">Active Skill - Ball Lightning</>: Fire a large shock bolt that fires off smaller shock bolts.
